events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin our review shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process for the engineering role.
We completed an initial screening to further understand your background and verify alignment with our teamâ€™s needs.
Thank you for promptly responding to our inquiries and providing additional details about your engineering experience.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our lead engineer for May 22nd, to evaluate your software development skills.
